remarks: Multiply an integral by a constant.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
statement:
itgmulc2.1 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
itgmulc2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
itgmulc2.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
iblmulc2 $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( C x. B ) ) e. L^1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
